original_text: This man was handed over to you by God’s deliberate plan and foreknowledge; and you, with the help of wicked men, put him to death by nailing him to the cross.
korean_text: 그가 하나님께서 정하신 뜻과 미리 아신 대로 내준 바 되었거늘 너희가 법 없는 자들의 손을 빌려 못 박아 죽였으나

sentences.original_text: This man was handed over to you
by God's deliberate plan and foreknowledge
and you, with the help of wicked men
put him to death by nailing him to the cross
